Text.Page:
I need a sample, a shard—anything from the fragments of the fallen argon fortress. They're in the {@Rgn:45005$$Skyfields} near the collapsed entrance.

Can you save me a trip, and probably my life, and collect one for me? Kill the wendigos before you go near them, though—they'll protect the fragments.

There's no getting inside the fortress, I fear. But the more we know about what the argons were doing here, the better.

Fortunately, we control a much more functional fortress—the Three Towers.

Take this report and give it to Borskan in Pathfinder Post. Thank you for your assistance.
Give your report to Ellisiana, and follow her instructions. There's still much to learn about this supposed argon retreat.

This report troubles me. It raises uncomfortable questions—possibly with even more uncomfortable answers.

We need to know why the argons abandoned this region. Will you help us?
